title: Digital Footprint Investigation
description: In this activity, students investigate their teachers to discover who has been spamming the rest of the school with anonymous emails. Use this form to customize the names of the teachers, the culprit, and other details to make the evidence fit your school.

fields.label: Start Date
fields.description: The date the anonymous emails start. All other logged activities are adjusted relative to this date.

fields.label: Coffee Teacher Name
fields.description: Name of the teacher whose digital footprint shows them searching for coffee to try to stay awake.

fields.label: Book Teacher Name
fields.description: Name of the teacher whose digital footprint shows them getting writer's blog while trying to write a book.

fields.label: Broadway Teacher Name
fields.description: Name of the teacher whose digital footprint shows them trying to arrange a Broadway field trip.

fields.label: Frog Teacher Name
fields.description: Name of the teacher whose digital footprint shows them finding frog eggs in their basement and trying to start a frog band.

fields.label: Culprit
fields.description: The teacher who sent the anonymous emails.

fields.label: Decoy
fields.description: The teacher who investigated the anonymous emails and initially appears to be the culprit.

fields.label: Anonymous Email Recipients
fields.description: List of email addresses the anonymous message is sent to. These will NOT receive actual emails; they will just display on the admin page under 'flagged messages'.

fields.label: Culprit Display Name
fields.description: The pseudonym for the culprit displayed as the 'from' on the messages under 'flagged messages'
